content: 1 monster s toy box sterling the star finished size 10 point-to-point materials  worsted weight yarn shown in loops and thread impeccable solids o butterscotch 120 yards  g 4 00mm hook or size needed to obtain a firm fabric  tapestry needle  stitch marker  stuffing  eyes o 15mm black safety eyes or o black felt see tutorial at the end of the pattern ©monster s toy box 2013 pattern may not be resold or redistributed without permission items made from this pattern may be sold with credit given to me as the designer 2 monster s toy box notes  all pieces are worked through the back loops only  the pattern is worked in continuous spiral use a stitch marker to mark the start of the round points make 5 round 1 single_crochet 4 in magic_ring 4 sts round 2 single_crochet 2 in next st 4 times 8 sts round 3 single_crochet in each st around round 4 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet in next st 4 times 12 sts round 5 single_crochet in each st around round 6 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts 4 times 16 sts round 7 single_crochet in each st around round 8 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet in next 3 sts 4 times 20 sts round 9 single_crochet in each st around round 10 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts 4 times 24 sts round 11 single_crochet in each st around round 12 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts 4 times 28 sts round 13 single_crochet in each st around round 14 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet in next 6 sts 4 times 32 sts round 15 single_crochet in each st around round 16 single_crochet 2 in next st single_crochet in next 7 sts 4 times 36 sts fasten_off with long tail do not fasten_off the fifth point continue to work for the body on next page ©monster s toy box 2013 pattern may not be resold or redistributed without permission items made from this pattern may be sold with credit given to me as the designer 3 monster s toy box front joining the next point with decrease round 1 decrease single_crochet in next 7 sts 2 times to join next point decrease in next point single_crochet in next 7 sts decrease single_crochet in next 7 sts repeat for each point 80 sts to join in a round decrease the first 2 sts of round 1 this is the first decrease of round 2 round 2 decrease single_crochet in next 6 sts 10 times 70 sts round 3 decrease single_crochet in next 12 sts 5 times 65 sts round 4 decrease single_crochet in next 11 sts 5 times 60 sts round 5 decrease single_crochet in next 10 sts 5 times 55 sts round 6 decrease single_crochet in next 9 sts 5 times 50 sts round 7 decrease single_crochet in next 3 sts
